original: Lofter, Knut Fritjof, tandläkare, Trollhättan, f. 10/3/07 i Spekeröd, Gbgs o. Boh. 1., av Edvard L. o. Hilda Hermansson. G. 43 m. Käthy Ljungkvist. Barn: Peter f. 44, Mona 45. — Stud:ex. i Lund 27, med. kand. där 31, tandläkare 34. Vik. i Jönköp. 34-36, praktik i Trollhättan sed. 37.
translated:
Lofter, Knut Fritjof, dentist, Trollhättan, born on March 10, 1907 in Spekeröd, Gothenburg and Bohuslän. Son of Edvard L. and Hilda Hermansson. Married in 1943 to Käthy Ljungkvist. Children: Peter, born in 1944, and Mona, born in 1945. 
— Attended Lund University, graduated in 1927. Received Bachelor of Medicine degree in 1931 and became a dentist in 1934. Worked temporarily in Jönköping from 1934 to 1936, and has been in practice in Trollhättan since 1937.
